summary: This is an automated email digest notification from a US Department of Justice email system, indicating that a single email with the subject "Epstein's Buddy Clinton" was quarantined as spam on August 24, 2020. The document shows an internal system flagging external communications related to the Epstein case.

persons.name: Clinton
persons.context: Mentioned in the subject line of a quarantined email ('Epstein's Buddy Clinton') that was blocked by the DOJ's email spam filter.

events.title: Email about Clinton and Epstein quarantined
events.description: An email with the subject "Epstein's Buddy Clinton" was placed in quarantine by the US Department of Justice email spam filter system.

keyFacts: A US Department of Justice email system automatically quarantined an email with the subject 'Epstein's Buddy Clinton' on August 24, 2020.
The email was flagged with a high spam score of 100 by the Proofpoint Protection Server filtering system.
The document is an automated end-user digest notification sent to a DOJ email address (sparneontrol@usdoj.gov) on August 25, 2020.
The notification shows internal systems were monitoring and filtering communications related to Jeffrey Epstein and political figures.
The email originated from an external domain (moraloutrage.org) and was routed through multiple servers before being blocked.
